visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object that renders a stacked inverted polar column chart. The chart should have a title 'Stacked inverted polar bars'. The x-axis should have labels positioned 15 pixels below the axis, and the y-axis should range from 0 to 45. The chart should use specific data series with two sets of data. Additionally, the chart should have custom configurations for margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a stacked inverted polar column chart. The chart type is set to 'column' with 'inverted' and 'polar' properties enabled, creating a polar bar chart that is rotated. The title of the chart is 'Stacked inverted polar bars'. The x-axis labels are positioned 15 pixels below the axis, and the y-axis ranges from 0 to 45. The plotOptions for the column series include stacking, border width, point padding, group padding, and data labels with specific text path attributes. The series data includes two sets of values, each representing a different series in the chart. The chart also has a custom margin configuration, with a top margin of 25 pixels.
